title: Ultimate Favorite Champions Survey!

replies.body: Lulu?

You.
I like you.
{{champion:61}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:61}}
i kNOw wHaT mAkeS THem tICk o_0 I KnoW HoW tO MAke thE TIckiNG sTOp 0_o

AHHHHHH, I'M A LOSER!
EVEN HEARING ONE OF HER QUOTES MAKE ME SMILE!
That is adorable ^^

Well Orianna is creepily adorable....much like GLaDOS.
You just can't resist wanting to squee over her, despite the fact you MIGHT be brutally murdered.
he looks hot in his new splash. that jawline could cut glass.

Who are your top 3 favorite champions for:

My overall top baes are {{champion:37}} and {{champion:412}} for everything. So I'll exclude them to make it fair to my other baes ;P

**Gameplay: **
{{champion:54}} - He'll always be my bae <3 Ulti too good
{{champion:202}} - Just recently picked him up. He's super fun to play!
{{champion:72}} - While I hate his passive, he is still super fun to play. Been playing him before his rework and I still play him despite it <3

**Visuals:**
{{champion:28}} - I've always liked her, but her new splash gives me a ton of hope for her update
{{champion:203}} - Probably one of my favorites. Love the Yin-Yang feel
{{champion:157}} - I really like his visuals since he stands out from the others fairly well. The blue and silver are a great touch to his dark hair and rough appearance. He's pretty attractive not to mention ;o

**Theme:**
{{champion:57}} - One of my favorite ents. His design is pretty good since his update.
{{champion:19}} - I'm still waiting on his update, but his current werewolf theme is pretty awesome!
{{champion:3}} - He's a pretty unique take on being a gargoyle. Obviously he'll be getting an update, but I still like it nonetheless!

**Personality:**
{{champion:161}} - Knowledge is power! And I really like his VO~
{{champion:202}} - His VO gives me shivers down my spine when playing him. Too good to keep the game quiet when playing as him. 
{{champion:420}} - I think she's pretty awesome. Also her accent is pretty nice on the ears~

**Lore:**
{{champion:131}} /{{champion:89}} - I prefer their old lore actually. At least their old personalities. I loved how before Leona was more patient and kind, whereas Diana was more about vengeance and wrath. It gave more depth to them instead of being the typical Sun = Fiery Passion and Moon = Calm and tranquil. Now they're kind of stereotypical, but still cool.
{{champion:268}} - His was one of my favorite to read when he came out. I loved how they revamped Shurima around him and made is super in depth and even awe-inspiring.
{{champion:157}} - I actually really enjoy his lore. There is still a veil of mystery around him, and I like how with {{champion:163}} 's release we got to see more into his past, and saw more of his personality!

I certainly agree on Leona/Diana. I'd like Yasuo more but he suffers from a similar problem to one of my favorite champions >.> 

{{champion:92}} 
"y no gank?"
"tem suc"
*An ally has disconnected*

Really hope Galio's rework does him justice. I love him.

Understandable on Yas haha. I still love him regardless, though I think it's partially because his appearance is very close to my taste in men, and also because my fiance plays him a lot so I associate Yas with him a lot haha :D 

I hope the same for Galio! I used to play him a lot as Support when he was viable haha. It's tough to play him nowadays since everyone is so damn slippery, but I'm still ever hopeful that his rework will be as amazing as Poppy's was. (I also still hope Poppy and Galio will still be connected lorewise ;3; )
Galio is Shyvana's friend as well, his wisdom and voice can calm her fury.
Dragon Mentor Galio skin Rito pls.

> [{quoted}](name=Desolas Arterius,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tuIH5vZZ,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2016-10-24T16:03:18.471+0000)

> Understandable on Yas haha. I still love him regardless, though I think it's partially because his appearance is very close to my taste in men, and also because my fiance plays him a lot so I associate Yas with him a lot haha :D 
>

It's tough to play him nowadays since everyone is so damn slippery, but I'm still ever hopeful that his rework will be as amazing as Poppy's was. (I also still hope Poppy and Galio will still be connected lorewise ;3; )

I love yasuo so much mostly because im a mechanical adc main(Lucian,ezreal,cait,draven,vayne). I find fun in outplaying my enemy and carrying and yasuo just really fits that. It all depends on how good you are and how you build him. He opens the window to 5v1 IF you are good enough/kept track of cc/and can dodge skillshots etc.) Heres why i love yasuo..

http://imgur.com/a/lORvw

> [{quoted}](name=Desolas Arterius,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tuIH5vZZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-10-24T15:56:32.201+0000)

> {{champion:72}} - While I hate his passive, he is still super fun to play. Been playing him before his rework and I still play him despite it <3

SKAR-SKAR-SKARNER!

SKARNER I CHOOSE YOU

{{champion:72}} : SKAR-SKAR

{{champion:420}} Awesome personality? You mean a fanatic that forces her religion to everyone and also forcing them to undergo a test that most likely kill them, while hating all undeads without even trying to understand them even though their beliefs are superior to hers and she's just not able to comprehend their wisdom? Ye, pretty awesome (let her playstyle alone which I like).

Aint nothing wrong with loving a fanatic.

I mean, I like pyscho murder art student too. Sooo yeah :D

I don't say it's wrong, just summing it up if you REALLY are sure you like her :D Tbh I like how her personality conflicts my beliefs and how she makes feel some way, that means the personality is 3 dimensional.

Haha I do. I read her entire lore and I do like that headstrong stubbornness she has. It's a nice change of pace because she backs up her talk with her fists unlike the stereotypical "priest" characters who are weak haha. 

Plus tough love is fun to mess with, and I like how she beat up GP despite loving him in order to get him back on his feet. Plus, like you said, you may not agree with her beliefs, but you can still respect her loyalty.

Gameplay
{{champion:134}}  - Burstmage and zone control, loved her gameplay from the first minute on. Ultimate feels powerful! :3
{{champion:117}}  - Running around being whimsical and cute, nothing better than that. Also turning enemys into harmless things and buffing teammates is fun.
{{champion:222}} - Most fun adc, feels actually good to go on a rampage with.

Visuals
{{champion:134}} - She is GORGEOUS! <3
{{champion:136}} - He is beautiful to see soar around Summoner´s Rift.
{{champion:37}} - DJ Sona

Theme
{{champion:134}}  - "More, I can be so much more!" Powerhungry, very attractive, young lady who has such an dark personality too. I melt for her! <3
{{champion:117}} - Too adorable!
{{champion:432}}  - *chimes intensivies*

Personality
{{champion:134}}  - Syndra is bae
{{champion:202}}  - One of the most interisting personalities in this game.
{{champion:240}} - "What was that...? Run straight into the tower...?"
 
Lore
{{champion:22}} 
{{champion:136}}

Top 3?
Sion, Poppy, Yorick. 

In about every category.
I heard you like tanks ;P
Eyup. And Yorick is my favorite juggernaut.

Gameplay
{{champion:101}}: "Magic? I'll show you real magic"
{{champion:26}}: The cruelty of superslowing someone for 5+ seconds makes me feel both satisfied and a little guilty.  Also https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xpe-JoGyPsY
{{champion:61}}: "I know what makes them tick. I know how to make the ticking stop."

Visuals - I'm not really that interested in the visuals tbh.
{{champion:40}}: Star guardian spash art really is so pretty though
{{champion:267}}: Idk I like Ebb and Flow and Tsunami
{{champion:161}}: While the abilities aren't exactly beautiful, there's something to them.

Theme
{{champion:101}}: Pure energy.  What more could you want?
{{champion:61}}: GLaDOS
{{champion:202}}: Who doesn't like this guy?

Personality
{{champion:61}}: "They come apart so easily. How do you put them back together again?"
{{champion:202}}: "I cannot be good. I must be perfection."
{{champion:161}}: "These creatures really can be repulsive."

Lore
{{champion:101}}: Rises up from the bottom seeking freedom for the slaves, and aiding his best friend as much as possible, even in ways that the friend would not desire.  When "betrayed," he plans his own rise rather than merely giving up.
{{champion:56}}: He adds another world to the lore, and may not even be uniquely powerful among his species.  I just find that to be interesting for this world.
{{champion:78}}: She seeks the person worthy of wielding her hammer without even realizing that it is she herself who deserves it.  Her humility and courage are a breath of fresh air in the lore.

Gameplay 
{{champion:30}} My main. Love him so much. That fight you barely survived from? You didn't.
{{champion:254}} Everything is solved by punching it harder.
{{champion:61}} Don't make the ball angry. Bad things happen to people who make the ball angry.
Visuals
{{champion:30}} His vgu is amazing, awesome model, and some really good artwork
{{champion:254}} Probably the most attractive character in the whole game.
{{champion:136}} Amazing looking Star Smaug is amazing looking.
Theme
{{champion:30}} Death prophet theme is all throughout his lore, quotes, and visuals
{{champion:202}} Don't play him, but damn, he has some of the coolest concepts and dialogue in the game that all fit his central theme of being a psychopath that loves to kill people. Only thing that is lacking is connecting his visuals to it as well, but the others were so good I couldn't leave him out.
{{champion:223}} Everything. Literally. Everything. Is. Perfect. 
Personality
{{champion:30}} For an undead lich he has a surprising array of emotions. Hearing his quotes towards all of the different champions he interacts with really fills out his character well, giving him way more personality than most games would give a lich. Especially the Lucian taunts. Hearing his quotes towards Lucian for the first time threw me for a loop. He still feels compassion, pity, and wants to give Lucian a solution that he genuinely believes will make him happy.
{{champion:223}} Roast king, insults op.
{{champion:254}} Everything is solved by punching it harder.
Lore 
{{champion:61}} The feels...
{{champion:223}} Awesome read, all one paragraph of it.
{{champion:102}} Half dragon with a sad past but a promising future, will be incredibly interested if Riot ever updates her lore to see how life has been for her after being in Demacia for a while.
TEEEEEEEMMOOOOOOOOOO

Bonus: I really really liked {{champion:72}}  old lore, because there was something so badass about a hyper intelligent crystalline scorpion bursting out of the ground full of rage and starts kicking everyone's ass before calming down and going. "Alright what's happening?" Then working with everyone and just overall being a hyper intelligent, angry, magical scorpian.

Come on what is not to like about him

Disclaimer: {{champion:202}} main (Glad so many people like him)

**Gameplay**
{{champion:202}} He is just so much fun. Plus, his ult is among the best in the game.
{{champion:412}} I just really like fucking up someones day.
{{champion:240}} KLED DOES NOT RUN.

**Visuals (going with base skins only)**
{{champion:136}} He is so pretty to look at. All of his abilities have a nice flair to them.
{{champion:245}} His looks and kit scream outplay to me. The abilities and passive POP with a nice blue color.
{{champion:202}} He just has so much swag. I hate myself for using that word, but there is no other way to describe that walk cycle. Plus the roses on death, beautiful.

**Theme**
{{champion:202}} Murderous artist looking to make the world beautiful, with an obsession with the number 4.
{{champion:121}} Murderous Alien looking to reach the pinnacle of evolution.
{{champion:119}} DRAAAAAAAVENNNN!!!!

**Personality**
{{champion:136}} He is the smuggest asshole not called Draven, and I love him for it.
{{champion:202}} His VO is absolutely fantastic, really gets you in the mood to make people beautiful. Does a great job of building this unhinged psychopath.
{{champion:240}} He is fucking hilarious.

**Lore**
{{champion:136}} Does a great job of showcasing his raw power, and actually makes him surprisingly human, with the death of a star.
{{champion:245}} He just has so much work dedicated to his characterization that it's hard not to root for the kid.
{{champion:202}} He feels like a real deranged killer and threat, being genuinely horrifying in a world that has alien invaders and an island made of death. His is also the lore that really fleshes out the background of so many characters, and of Ionia itself that it's hard for me not to put him on here.

{{champion:45}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:7}}

I have to edit this. I love LB's ability to juke however I rarely play her. From every other perspective I love {{champion:223}} . His character, his abilities, everything. Just wish his damage scaled better!
Well Zed, Shen and Akali are pretty hot. Ekko and Vayne less so but still cool.
